actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide financial relief to state and local governments by eliminating a requirement that would result in a duplicative mailing each year.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that States and local governments shall not be required to report refunds, credits, or offsets made before January 1, 1983.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide financial relief to state and local governments by eliminating a requirement that would result in a duplicative mailing each year.
